value.title: How to Use CALCULATE in Power BI
value.excerpt: This is one of the most import function to master in Power BI. You can filter your data and create complex measure such as year over year comparisons with ease with these easy to follow tutorial. More more help this function.

value.title: 3 ways to try Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you wanting to try Power BI, but not sure where to start? I look at some ways you can get up and running with Power BI quickly. This could be for an individual, or for your organization within Office 365.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube --

value.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily
value.excerpt: Sometimes you need Power BI support. Even if you know a lot about Power BI, everyone has a brain fart from time to time. Adam looks at 5 different ways you can get Power BI support to get you past your hurdle.  Community Site: https://community.powerbi.com Twitter Hashtag: #PowerBI and #pbihelp Facebook

images.title: 5 ways to get Power BI Support #pbifamily

value.title: Can I use the audit log if I'm a Power BI Admin?
value.excerpt: In this video, I answer a question I get fairly often. Can I use the audit log if I have the Power BI service administrator role assigned to me within Office 365.   I also make an announcement about the future of Guy in a Cube.  Admin portal doc - https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-admin-portal/

value.title: Common Data Service for Analytics (CDS-A) and Power BI - an Introduction
value.excerpt: In this video, Matthew Roche joins Adam for a look at the Common Data Service for Analytics. This is an offering that will be coming out in public preview in the Summer of 2018 and will help you to bring together data sources into a common schema.  Business Application Platform: Power BI | Business Applications

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Create a Power BI app registration in 6 steps

This power bi tutorial is needed as we see many questions about the proper configuration for a Power BI app registration regarding which settings to use.  App registrations are needed

value.title: Create Mail enabled security groups to use in Power BI via PowerShell

value.title: Disable free signups in the Power BI service
value.excerpt: Learn how you can block free signups for the Power BI service. Free signups are also what are referred to as viral signups. value.title: Download and Deploy a K12 Power BI Solution for schools
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shares a Power BI solution he created for K12 schools in United States education. This solution includes instructions to create views for use with the Power BI reports. It also includes a Power BI Desktop template for pre-created reports based on your school data.  GitHub Repo

value.title: How the Power BI Data Region is selected
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how the Power BI data region is selected. This is the what you see when you go to About Power BI and see "Your data is stored in". You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft

value.title: Power BI Auditing
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at the Power BI Auditing feature that was made available a few weeks ago. I show how to turn it on and how to search. This can be helpful with understanding who is doing what within your organization.  Offical Docs: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-admin-auditing/

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Visualizing Data

value.title: Ragged Hierarchies in Analysis Services with Power BI and Excel

value.title: Tooltips, tooltips, tooltips in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows how you can display multiple values within a tooltip for a visual. He walks through the DAX measure and also shows some pitfalls to look out for when it comes to filter context.  Go here for the sample DAX statement: https://guyinacube.com/2017/06/tooltips-tooltips-tooltips-power-bi/
